metadata.Title: CVE-2017-17523 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
lilypond-invoke-editor in LilyPond 2.19.80 does not validate strings before launching the program specified by the BROWSER environment variable, which allows remote attackers to conduct argument-injection attacks via a crafted URL, as demonstrated by a --proxy-pac-file argument.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2017-17523` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

lilypond - 2.18.2-12build1
lilypond-data - 2.18.2-12build1
lilypond-fonts - 2.18.2-12build1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: lilypond package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.18.2-12build1').
